item.title: Stop Sending Your Kids To Schools Where Teachers Celebrate Murder
item.description: A system that has granted such power to murder-loving ideologues cannot be redeemed; it must be destroyed and remade.

item.title: UATX An Outlier Among Colleges In Expressing Opposition To Charlie Kirk’s Assassination
item.description: The dean of UATX wrote to students and faculty describing security measures in place and reaffirming UATX’s commitment to free speech.

item.title: The Trump Admin Is Right To Screen Potential U.S. Citizens For ‘Good Moral Character’
item.description: If Lafayette, William Penn, and Winston Churchill were subject to individualized examination before a grant of honorary citizenship, then certainly th...

item.title: American History’s Stark Warning Against Tolerating Political Violence
item.description: In the runup to the Civil War, the beating of a U.S. senator nearly to death was celebrated across the South.

item.title: ‘Self-Care’ Spending Might Explain Why America Is So Deeply In Debt
item.description: However much we want to blame Congress for the nation’s budgetary woes, our lawmakers do little more than reflect the societal zeitgeist.
